chunks.cleaned_english_translation: Letter Seventeen. Fragment. It appears to go against the judgments of the holy Fathers if a secular person or layperson attempts to remove priests from the churches where they were appointed at the time of their ordination.
chunks.original_latin:
EPISTOLA XVII. (Fragmentum) Contra sanctorum Patrum censuras videtur existere,
si saecularis homo vel laicus presbyteros ab
ecclesiis, in quibus tempore ordinationis eorum denominati
vel introducti fuerint, nitetur expellere.
